title: Career Prospects - M. Sc. Applied Computer Science
content:
After graduation
The degree "Master of Science in Applied Computer Science" enables you to work in all phases of system and software development. In addition to software development, advice on the introduction of information systems is an important task. One of the strengths of our graduates is their particularly broad training in the methods of applied computer science.
To start your career after completing your masterâ€™s degree, you can fall back on the network of the WIAI faculty. You may have already done your master's thesis in cooperation with a practice partner.
Typical fields of activity are private companies and public institutions with their increasing tasks in document and content management, the media industry of traditional and electronic media. In addition, there are tourism and leisure as areas in which numerous new information technologies such as mobile, location-based information services are used, as well as the cultural area with museums and archives through to monument preservation.
